citances.sentence: 27 Despite the caution expressed by Lindgren J in Chamberlain v RG & H Investments Pty Ltd (ACN 000 599 477) [2009] FCA 1531 ; (2009) 76 ACSR 415 at [24] , I do not consider it necessary to make an order under s 1322(4)(d) extending time for applying for approval under s 477(2B).
